title: Azure Cloud Architect
description:
Clever Grapes.Thanks to our experience gained over the years in the Microsoft Software Development market and using the best Agile Principles, we will successfully build and deliver the software. Clever Grapes will support teams with top-notch engineers, due to a rigorous recruitment process focused on finding ambitious, self-organized, and open-minded individuals, fitting client's needs, and offering the best matches to integrate with the team.If you are looking for an opportunity to solve deep technical problems, build innovative solutions, and work with top-notch software developers, we might have the role for you!Position: Azure Cloud ArchitectTechnologies: Azure, CAF, Azure DevOps, TerraformResponsibilities:

Building cloud foundations for the transformation of a financial institution to the cloud
Development and recommendation of architecture solutions
Conducting technical workshops
Creating technical documentation

Technical skills necessary in the project:

Architecture design in Azure
Infrastructure as Code automation
Knowledge of issues related to the landing zone
Understanding of security issues
English B2/C1 (writing documentation in English)
Polish B2/C1

We Offer:

Exciting Projects: With clients across all industries and sectors, we offer an opportunity to work on market-defining products using the latest technologies.
Work-Life Balance: Clever Grapes prioritizes work-life balance, which is why we offer flexible work schedules.
Remote Work. We are open to remote work full or part-time
B2B contract and competitive rate 
Benefits: Insurance, Medical care, and Multisport

Join us! :)

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
Chcesz współpracować z doświadczonymi developerami? Chcesz doświadczyć autonomii i mieć wpływ na produkt, który tworzysz? Chcesz budować innowacyjne produkty w prawidłowo zaimplementowanym Scrumie? Lubisz pragmatyczne rozwiązania (nazwa zobowiązuje)? Jeśli tak, to jesteś we właściwym miejscu! Dołącz do nas jako Senior Data Engineer! 🚀🔥Czym będziesz się zajmować 👇
Projektowaniem, wdrażaniem i obsługą skalowalnych rozwiązań zwiększających możliwości przetwarzania danych w projekcie z branży healthcare
Będziesz uczestniczyć w całym cyklu rozwoju produktu: architektura, projekt, programowanie, kontrola jakości, wdrażanie, utrzymanie
Monitorowaniem jakości danych dostarczanych do wewnętrznego Data Lake, identyfikowaniem potencjalnych problemów i korygowaniem rozbieżności
Ustalaniem priorytetów w zadaniach o znacznej złożoności
Wsparciem planowania w celu optymalizacji i przyspieszenia postępów prac
Nasze oczekiwania 🔎
Min. 3 lata doświadczenia na podobnym stanowisku
Świetna znajomość rozwiązań AWS
Doświadczenie z usługami AWS: Glue, EMR, Lambda, Athena
Doświadczenie w pracy z procesami ETL 
Biegła znajomość SQL oraz zaawansowany Python wykorzystywany do przetwarzania danych (np. przy użyciu Apache Spark)
Znajomość narzędzia GitLab CI/CD
Rozumienie roli hurtowni danych w organizacji
Samodzielność w działaniu i gotowość do uruchomienia projektu od podstaw
Dyspozycyjność do pracy z zespołem w USA (godz. 15.00-19.00), min. 2 dni w tygodniu w biurze
Dobre umiejętności komunikacyjne i jęz. angielski na poziomie B2+ (w mowie i piśmie)
Mile widziane 👌
Podstawowa znajomość Databricks, Domino
Wiedza z zakresu wykorzystania BigData
Doświadczenie w pracy z Airflow
Doświadczenie i wiedza na temat projektowania rozwiązań IT dla MedTech
Dołączając do Pragmatic Coders możesz liczyć na:
Rozwój (wewnętrzne procesy wymiany wiedzy i doświadczeń pomiędzy projektami i developerami, budżet szkoleniowy, wsparcie tech leadów w ustalaniu ścieżki Twojego rozwoju itp.),
Autonomię i swobodę – masz możliwość zaangażowania się w rozwój produktu i realny wpływ na jego kształt,
Elastyczne godziny pracy, płaską strukturę organizacyjną, opartą o zaufanie i profesjonalizm, 
Szereg benefitów pozapłacowych (Multisport, prywatna opieka medyczna, lekcje angielskiego, wyjścia i wyjazdy integracyjne)

Ale jeśli myślisz, że to wszystko – to Jesteś w dużym błędzie....😮...bo my Wiemy, że największą wartością Pragmatic Coders są ludzie:  ich doświadczenie, mindset, podejście do pracy, team spirit i stawianie czoła ambitnym celom. Dlatego też, wiedząc jak wspaniałych i inspirujących ludzi mamy na pokładzie – stworzyliśmy program PC Venture. W praktyce oznacza to tyle, że pracownicy i kontraktorzy Pragmatic Coders mogą skorzystać ze wsparcia finansowego i merytorycznego na rozwój własnego startupu! 😍Chcemy pomóc founderom w najtrudniejszym etapie zakładania startupu - czyli walidacji pomysłu i zdobywaniu inwestorów.Wsparcie działu UX, startup business consultanta, product ownera - to tylko niektóre korzyści, jakie czekają na naszych współpracowników!Może i Ty od wielu lat myślałeś/-aś o swoim biznesie, ale nie wiedziałeś/-aś jak się za to zabrać ❓Będąć częścią Pragmatic Coders pomożemy zrealizować Ci najśmielsze marzenia o swoim start-upie 🚀To co? Może porozmawiamy? 😏

title: Senior Scala Developer
description:
Scalaric is a medium-sized, flat-structured software company. Since 2013 we've been responsible for the software development of Tagger - an award-winning all-in-one influencer marketing platform that provides reliable data and maximizes the ROI. In our projects, you will have to keep up with the needs of the influencer marketing industry and make our product go beyond the expectations of our clients! Thanks to our solutions, the world's biggest brands can run successful marketing campaigns with the best Creators, all in one place! Find more information about our product and the brands we cooperate with at https://scalaric.com/case-study. Currently, we’re searching for a Senior Scala Developer who will be a part of our Backend team. We are looking for a great personality to fit our team and stay with us for a long time.  
🥷🏽Curious about your responsibilities? You will:

Ensure scalability, maintainability and high availability of the service,
Collaborate with other teams in order to improve the overall architecture of our data intensive application,
Improve the application lifecycle, from deployment to real-time monitoring processes,
Mentor other, less experienced developers,
Participate in other internal initiatives (e.g. technical recruitment), 
Independence in your tasks and decisions while keeping the rest of the team in mind,
Take part in the code review process.


☝️ We appreciate, if you have…

Approx. 4+ years of experience with functional programming and Scala programming language,
Experience with relational and non-relational databases,
 Experience with Enterprise Message Buses like Kafka,
Interest in creating well thought out infrastructure and APIs,
A proactive approach, “can do” attitude, growth mindset, problem-solving skills, and being a real team player,
Independence in your tasks and decisions while keeping the rest of the team in mind,
Good communication skills,
Ability to communicate easily in Polish and English.

🤖 Technologies we use:

Scala, 
Cats & Cats Effect, 
fs2, 
Kafka,
Clickhouse,
Akka,
MySQL.

 💚 We have some great Perks & Benefits for you!

Develop features for a product used daily by the world's biggest brands,
Work with an experienced, diverse team of cool people,
Work in a modern office in a great location close to the city center,
Flexible working hours,
Kitchen full of snacks and treats,
Open bar in the office,
Car and bike parking area,
A relaxed work atmosphere — no dress code, no open space.
 Interested? Apply! We could talk by phone, Google Meet or Face2Face in our office ☕Contact directly to Klaudia and ask about cooperation details.  Check out:Our Recruitment process

title: Senior iOS Developer
description:
For our customer, an international company operating in sports industry, we are looking for a team of 6 people on the position:Senior iOS Developer Workplace: Hybrid mode (partly in Warsaw) Tasks: 

Build beautiful B2C frontend applications for iOS and web platforms, focusing on scalability and performance,
Design, code, and manage large-scale applications end-to-end,
Code in Swift & SwiftUI and master other cutting-edge technologies, 
Reliably deliver high-quality software on assigned projects. Work with the team to break down responsibilities,
 Interact with our backend systems, 
Work with a passionate, energized group of extraordinary people, 
Set the technical foundations to enable future product and team growth, 
Have so much fun and exciting things to do. 

If you are:         
A top talent software engineer with at least 5 years of hands-on experience developing mobile applications, 
Experienced in building large-scale products and have deep knowledge and understanding of software architecture, 
Expertise in Swift development, 
Aspired to develop features in both iOS Environment, including SwiftUI, UIKit, Core Animation, XC Cloud, XC Test and more,
Familiar with UI design principles, patterns, and best practices, 
 Fluently speaking English, 
Experienced with APIs and third-party libraries such as BLE, camera, sensors, HealthKit, etc. – advantage,
Experienced with backend development – an advantage,
Experienced with SQL/NoSQL databases, such as MySQL, Elasticsearch, etc. – advantage, 
Preferably with a degree in computer science or similar, 
Love to learn new technologies and tackle challenges 

 Our offer: 

B2B contract,
access to the system of benefits, including medical care, sports card and many others,
occasional gifts

title: DevOps with ML
description:
The purpose of this role will be to work in a global agile development team helping deliver and optimize technology towards target state. The successful candidate will help to optimize platform infrastructure, monitoring and cybersecurity alongside with technical view and optimization for business developed machine learning models, improve existing ones and manage the production model’s infrastructure to support and improve  way of working in order to achieve strategic objectives.Hybrid- KrakówRequirements:

Excellent knowledge in DevOps practices, CI/CD 
Familiarity with CI/CD tools – Jenkins & Ansible 
Good understanding of Data Science, ETL process and Python 
Experience with UNIX-based systems and shell scripting 
Understanding of data handling (databases, object storages, SQL/noSQL) 
Familiarity with version-control management – Git 
Ability to understand complex products, problems and solutions 
Ability to work independently including evaluating different solutions to a problem 
Communication on high level of proficiency and technical expertise with very good collaboration and interpersonal skills
Career background in technology with 5+ years of experience in object-oriented software development 
Education background in Computer Science field 

Nice to have:

Experience in Machine learning and/or AI experience would be an advantage
Experience with GCP 
Python skills with practical knowledge of relevant libraries TensorFlow, Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn would be an advantage
Containerization and cloud knowledge 
Familiarity with ELK monitoring stack

title: Senior MS Dynamics Developer / Tech Lead

skills.name: Microsoft Dynamics CRM on Dynamics 365 for Sales (online)

description: Client is one of the largest banking and financial services organisations in the world, with operations in 64 countries and territories. Global Banking & Commercial Banking have chosen Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Sales as the core customer relationship management (CRM) platform, which is currently live in ~55 countries. As a D365 Developer you will be working closely and effectively with our customers and responsible for reviewing clients’ business process, providing solid analysis, assessing solutions and advising our customers on how to best meet their goals. Qualification: Must have skills:✓ Candidate should have at least 5+ years of Microsoft Dynamics CRM implementation experience and have participated in a minimum of 3 complete life cycle implementations. Hands on technical experience on Dynamics 365 for Sales (online) is a must. ✓ Experience using the CRM SDK to interface programmatically with Dynamics CRM. ✓ Able to interpret requirement and customize CRM to achieve asked functionality ✓ Experience on Canvas App and Pages on Dynamics 365 Platform ✓ Experience building PCF controls on Dynamics 365 Platform ✓ Microsoft .Net stack – will be familiar with .NET 4.6.2. ✓ Excellent C# and JavaScript programming skills ✓ Experience on Azure Functions, App Insights and Azure Service Bus ✓ Test driven techniques including TDD, automated unit testing and mocking. ✓ Exposure to writing C# Unit Tests using framework such as NUnit, FakeXrmEasy, Moq ✓ Comfortable working with GIT source control Preferred Skills:✓ Experience using front end technologies like HTML 5, ReactJS, AngularJS ✓ Azure platform specifically App Services, Functions, Logging and various storage technologies ✓ Knowledge of messaging platforms such as MQ Series and Azure Service Bus. An appreciation of event driven architecture and publish / subscribe is desirable. ✓ SOLID principles and design patterns to produce robust code. ✓ Authentication and authorization using frameworks such as Auth 2.0 ✓ Logging frameworks and metrics including App Insights and Serilog ✓ Using solution design will be able to break down into technical components with supportable documentation. ✓ Code reviewing of pull requests and ensuring that quality of code and build is maintained ✓ Ability to proof of concept other technologies to aid the solution architect to meet requirements ✓ Familiar with Azure DevOps CI/CD pipeline.

title: C/Python Developer
description:
For more than 10 years our team actively supports software development that is a part of ITER project (the first fusion device to produce net energy: https://www.iter.org). ITER is the biggest scientific research project than spans over multiple nations.We cooperate with biggest scientific institutions accross Europe and the World. We support scientific community in the process of combining and integrating numerous algorithms inside single, unified computational platform.In a day to day work we work with number of programming languages: C/C++/Python/Java/Fortran, we create scripts for the process automation: bash/tch, we work on container based solutions (Docker/docker-compose) to make it possible to run simulation in virtually any environment.For a new project, run under EUROfusion consortium, we are looking for people with the experience in one of the mentioned languagess.One of the integral part of our job is a constant development. We are looking for open minded people who are eager to learn new things on a daily basis. Research and development is an integral part of our day to day work.We are looking for people who graduated either from physics (with solid computer science background) or computer science. We are open for working with studens.
Poznań, Jana Pawła II, 10Requirements:
Master degree (Physics, Computer Science, or other relevant discipline) - we are open for working with students
Familiar with at least one of the programming languages: Java, C, C++, Fortran, Python
Familiar with CLI based work environment (bash/tcsh)
Know how of debugging applications at high performance clusters
Open minded approach when it comes to dealing with number of various technology stacks
Eager to learn and extend knowledge on daily basis
Familiar with script based development (Bash/Python)
Experience with GCC/Intel is a plus
Familiar with various build systems (Ant, Maven, GNU Make, CMake, EasyBuild)
Familiar with GNU Emacs/VIM
English is a must - we cooperate with people across the whole Europe
Nice to have:
Experience with parallel computations - MPI
Experience with the tools used during development process - Git, Jira, Confluence, Jenkins, Gitlab (self hosted)
Link to your profile at LinkedIn
Link to your repositories at Gitlab/GitHub/Bitbucket/other

We provide:

Multisport, medical insurance - LuxMed, financial benefits for holidays
wide spectrum of profesional trainings
elastic working hours
work environment that is personalized and fits personal requirements
private parking
work within well established and ambitious team
participation in projects focused on delivery of novel solutions
dedicated aread to relax and for conducting less formal meetingss

title: Docker Developer
description:
For more than 10 years our team actively supports software development that is a part of ITER project (the first fusion device to produce net energy: https://www.iter.org). ITER is the biggest scientific research project than spans over multiple nations.We cooperate with biggest scientific institutions accross Europe and the World. We support scientific community in the process of combining and integrating numerous algorithms inside single, unified computational platform.In a day to day work, we work on integration of the Physics based code inside Docker containers. We also support external teams in the area of Continuous Integration & Delivery (Gitlab/Jenkins).For a new project, run under EUROfusion consortium, we are looking for people with the experience in one of the mentioned technologies.One of the integral part of our job is a constant development. We are looking for open minded people who are eager to learn new things on a daily basis. Research and development is an integral part of our day to day work.We are looking for people who graduated either from physics (with solid computer science background) or computer science. We are open for working with studens.Poznań, Jana Pawła II, 10
Requirements:

Master degree (Computer Science, Physics, or other relevant discipline) - we are open for working with students
Knowledge of how to install and configure Linux based systems
Familiar with virtualization and containers - Docker
Knowledge of how to debug containers on remote machines/Cloud
Experience related to network management inside Docker containers
Familiar with Linux based firewall (iptables)
Eager to learn on daily basis
Familiar with script based development (Bash/Python)
Experience with GCC/Intel is a plus
English is a must - we cooperate with people across the whole Europe
Nice to have:
Experience with at least one of the languages Java, C++, Fortran, Python
Experience with parallel computations - MPI
Knowledge of Singularity, uDocker, Podman is a plus

title: Senior DWH Developer
description:
Are you looking for an interesting project, but you come across only boring technologies? Tired of working without development prospects? Or maybe you want to develop yourself in a top solution, but don't know how to start?If you answered yes to at least one of these questions, we have something you will definitely be interested in. 
You've hit the jackpot! 🎯
 Become a part of InfiniteDATA team to build, optimize and maintain big-scale data warehouses for best known brands on Polish and European market.  We are the main partner of Snowflake❄️in this part of Europe. We have one of the two in Poland Snowflake Data Superhero on board (be sure to visit Michał's profile, who will enthuse you with his passion). We have been working with Snowflake for a few years, we have developed a great trust and therefore we can give you certification. We have proprietary solutions and most of our projects are based on SF. 
Hands on board are needed! We’re looking for 
⚙️Senior DWH Developer⚙️
 "Sounds great, but will I be a good fit?"👉Let's test it out, find out what responsibilities await you : ✔️design and build data warehouse solutions for clients✔️meet directly with customers and work together with stakeholders to investigate and propose the best suitable solution and ✔️architecture for their needs decide the best tool sets for the project✔️participate in requirements gathering, technical specifications, architectural design and support development as it relates to database design,✔️finding the best tech solution among all possible to solve the existing business problems✔️work closely with developers to help designing of required database structures, resolve problems as well as optimize performance✔️providing ongoing analysis of enterprise data stores to ensure the overall architecture remains appropriate  
👉A quick tech&exp checklist:✔️4+ years of experience in the development of a large database or warehouse (mainly Snowflake) in the following areas: ETL, data model building, performance optimization, proficiency in SQL✔️experience in writing Python scripts, alternatively very good knowledge of another programming language✔️very good knowledge in the area of relational databases and ETL processes;  ✔️ability to work independently as well as coach technical team✔️English language business fluency✔️problem-solving and analytical skills✔️process knowledge: ITIL✔️high communication skills, open mind✔️Databases: Snowflake, PostgreSQL✔️Orchestrator: ScheduleIN / AutomateNOW, Control-M, AirFlow✔️ETL: Informatica Power Center, Talend✔️Cloud AWS - basic knowledge✔️DevOps - basic knowledge ✔️Gitlab (CI/CD Pipeline✔️Shell, Rest Api, Python, Robot Framework✔️ALM - Application Lifecycle Management ✔️Data Vault - DWH implementations based Data Vault✔️Requirements  gathering, feasibility  study, design, modeling and development of DWH Layer - Ingestion, Integration, Distribution 💰Perks? Here we go!🥇we are happy to share our know-how and provide certification🌏grounded relationship with the client and good working atmosphere 📈real career development opportunities 💻100% remote work or hybrid model (you decide) 🩺medical care (Luxmed) ⚽sport card (Multisport) 📝training and certification budget🤝employee referral program 🗣️architect’s care 🏙️comfortable and quite office in the city center (Rondo Daszyńskiego) Curious about what the hiring process looks like?▶️Once we receive your CV, you will be contacted by our HR department.▶️After a short conversation about your experience and expectations, the HR department will direct you to a technical meeting with one of our Managers or Architects. ▶️After the technical meeting, the Recruiter will get back to you with feedback and together you will determine the next steps.
Do you have questions, concerns? 👩‍🏫Our Recruitment Manager Kasia will be happy to dispel them. No need to wait, leave us your resume at the link, 
we would love to take a look at it and get in touch with you 👇🤳

title: Data Engineer (ETL)
description:
Primaris Services to ponad 230 ekspertów na pokładzie i 12 lat doświadczenia w branży IT na rynku polskim oraz zagranicznym.
Realizujemy ambitne projekty o wysokiej złożoności z różnych obszarów - m.in. bankowości, ubezpieczeń, funduszy inwestycyjnych czy branży logistycznej (mamy ponad 40 aktywnych klientów!). Rośniemy w siłę oraz ciągle poszerzamy portfolio zarówno naszych usług jak i klientów.
Zakres naszej działalności obejmuje budowę systemów od zera, ich rozwój oraz utrzymanie,  wdrożenia produktowe, alokacje całych Zespołów, a także pojedynczych Ekspertów w strukturach Klienta. 
Ponadto od kilku lat działamy bardzo intensywnie jako złoty Partner firmy UiPath (obszar Robotic Process Automation) budując roboty i sprzedając licencje u naszych Klientów.
Co miesiąc dołącza do nas 7 nowych osób! Wierzymy, że zgrany zespół i ludzie z pasją to klucz do naszego wspólnego sukcesu! Właśnie dlatego ciągle poszukujemy nowych, zdolnych osób, które zasilą nasze szeregi.
 
Aktualnie do jednego z zespołów poszukujemy osoby na stanowisko Data Engineera, która posiada min. 1 rok komercyjnego doświadczenia, w tym w kontakcie z klientem zagranicznym.

Dlatego jeśli szukasz pracy na stanowisku Data Engineera - chętnie z Tobą porozmawiamy!

Stack technologiczny: Groovy, Java (17+), bazy danych SQL-owe, serwisy REST-owe.

Projekt który będziemy gotowi Ci zaproponować dotyczy: integracji danych klienckich z platformą pricingową software służący do wyceny towarów oraz usług, konfiguracji promocji oraz rabatów, jak również analizy danych sprzedażowych.
 

W naszej firmie będziesz mógł/mogła liczyć na: 

Pracę w organizacji z ugruntowaną pozycją rynkową
Projekty, w których będziesz miał/miała wpływ na ich rozwój
Współpracę z ciekawymi klientami biznesowymi z różnych branż (m.in.:  finanse, bankowość, ubezpieczenia, healthcare, robotyzacja, energetyka, media),
Permanentny mentoring zarówno techniczny jak i biznesowo-menedżerski, np. podczas naszych cyklicznych szkoleń (m.in. Git, Gitflow, Angular, Docker), czy wew. programów rozwojowych (Primaris x TechTalks, Primaris Leadership Academy) oraz zewnętrznych kursów.Już na etapie on-boardingu zapewniamy dostęp do naszych wewnętrznych szkoleń, cyklicznych spotkań, które serializujemy na Confluence oraz platformy e-learning
Świetną atmosferę pracy, wśród zaangażowanych ludzi z pasją w płaskiej strukturze z prostymi procesami
Współpracę w oparciu o kontrakt B2B - w tym możliwość skorzystania z benefitu płatnych dni wolnych od świadczenia usług/lub umowę o pracę
Kompleksowy pakiet benefitów skrojonych na miarę - prywatna opieka medyczna dla Ciebie oraz dla Twojej rodziny, Multisport dla Ciebie i os. towarzyszącej - Ty decydujesz, co wybierasz!

Tą rolą opiekuje się Kasia i to właśnie z nią spotkasz się podczas pierwszej rozmowy.
Cały proces rekrutacyjny oraz onboarding prowadzony jest zdalnie.

title: PHP Developer
description:
Jesteśmy ponad 100-osobowym polskim software house’em, który chętnie chwyta się ciekawych i rozwojowych tematów. Mamy siedzibę we Wrocławiu i oddział w Białymstoku, ale współpracujemy również w pełni zdalnie.Działamy w oparciu o Scrum, cenimy sobie współpracę w luźniej, koleżeńskiej atmosferze oraz nastawienie na działanie.Realizujemy projekty dla polskich i międzynarodowych klientów oraz rozwijamy kilka własnych produktów.Wspiera nas w tym nasz Dział R&D, który stale wyszukuje kolejne nowinki i rozwiązania w obszarze rozszerzonej rzeczywistości, sztucznej inteligencji i deep learningu. Jako Senior PHP Developer dołączysz do zespołu pracującego przy rozwoju naszego własnego produktu, platformy do zarządzania wiedzą w organizacjach.


KLUCZOWE KOMPETENCJE 
min. 4 lata doświadczenia w programowaniu komercyjnym aplikacji webowych 
solidna znajomość PHP, programowania obiektowego i wzorców projektowych
doświadczenie w pisaniu testów jednostkowych

znajomość Symfony 5 
doświadczenie w pracy z REST API 

znajomość relacyjnych baz danych (PostgreSQL)
praktyczna znajomość Dockera 

znajomość systemu kontroli wersji Git oraz reguł GitFlow 

dobra znajomość języka angielskiego (min. B2)
komunikatywna znajomość języka polskiego (min. B2) 

MILE WIDZIANE
znajomość zagadnień związanych z architekturą opartą o mikroserwisy i Amazon Web Services 
znajomość wzorca CQRS
wiedza z obszaru Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment
doświadczenie w pracy wg metodyki Agile
doświadczenie z React.js, Redux, TypeScript, Material UI
OFERUJEMY
dowolną formę zatrudnienia 
elastyczne godziny pracy
możliwość 100% pracy zdalnej
prywatną opiekę medyczną, dopłatę do karty Multisport
PROCES REKRUTACYJNYCenimy Twój czas, dlatego proces rekrutacyjny składa się tylko z 2 etapów - rozmowy o Twoim doświadczeniu oraz weryfikacji technicznej.
